s2_text: Fingerprint, password, induction card, key, Siri and Koogeek Home app.
s3_text: Designed to work with Apple HomeKit using Bluetooth Smart technology.
s4_text: OLED display will automatically light up when someone stands in front of the display.
s5_text: Lock and unlock your door using Siri voice commands.
s6_text: Up to 100 different fingerprints can be stored and 100,000 open records can be stored and searched.
s7_text: Responsive touchscreen is visible day or night.
s8_text: Built with the high strength alloy shell and stainless steel lock-tongue, strong and paired seamlessly with the security lock.
s9_text: This lock can change the direction to fit both left-handed and right-handed door.
s10_text: Low battery alert lets you know when itâ€™s time to change batteries.
s11_text: Allow you to type any number of random digits, and can still gain access as long as the 1 correct password is embedded in the longer set of numbers.
